channel.title: [PI]Npc drops
channel.description: not sure what other files I need to make Npc's drop items, but I thought I would only need NpcDrops.tsm. [url=http://pastebin.com/DYGf52Xp]this is what I added into my NpcDrops.tsm[/url] scroll down to the bottom to find ice spiders. I tested its drops with an AGS, and I tried both rarity :1 and rarity :100. they both don't drop the AGS at all. what do I do?

acutally if its like this say i put this in my server

8133,11732,1,0

8133 would be the corp beast and 11732 would be the dragon boots and the 0 is the rarity so 0 means it dorp 100% you kill the corp beast

item.title: [PI]Npc drops
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“blo0d pker, post:4, topic:385860”]since I already showed my NpcDrops.tsm, this is my config.java of the npc drops section
so if one reads like…

{6260, 995, 20000, 7}

if i’m correct, 6260 is the Npc ID, 995 is the Item ID, 20000 is the amount dropped of the item ID, and 7 is the drop rarity/percentage?[/quote]
yeah, im pretty sure thats correct

But here is the thing with the pi drops
For the rarity, the higher it is, the rarer it is, the lower it is, the more common it is

Like if its 1 instead of 7 i see it as a 1:1 ratio of being dropped
If something like 100 instead of 7 it would be 1:100 ratio, obviously meaning its rarer.

Read full topic
